name: Reboot (itch) (TGP-Games)
description:
This is a game for the 2023.1 Brackeys Game Jam. Fight off hostile robots, collect energy and save humanity of the apocalypse!

Controls: Key Use Left Click ShootWMove upA Move to the leftSMove downD Move to the rightEscape Open/ Close the pause-menu H Show/ Hide the UIX Mute all soundeffects 1Equip weapon 12Equip weapon 23Equip weapon 3 Your Goal:

The goal of the game is to obtain enough energy to power a time machine and to stop the apocalypse in the past. You can get energy by killing enemies, doing quests, finding special items and by surviving a level. To make it easier to survive, you can buy armor and weapons in the shop. 

Known bugs:
  • The 3rd weapon spawns the wrong particles (lava-particles) which never despawn
  • The background of the Main-Menu is missing sometimes
  • The death-screen sometimes won't load when the UI is hidden
